comment._content: It was nice to see you there. I'm excited about the great stuff going on at the Brooklyn Museum and on the web. Your talk definitely inspired me. Keep it up! Hope you enjoyed your visit to our little town!

comment._content:
Thanks so much - we had a great time.  I'm still here for a few days attending the Web 2.0 Expo.  So cool, I just got to meet and see Heather Champ from Flickr give a session!  

Thanks for coming to our session!  ~shelley
